name: No Filter (Hashtag girl - 2020/11/11, GMT 23:11)
description: Cadie Desbiens-Desmeules {Alter Ego installation excerpt}, 2020. The artist turns the technology back on itself, hacking IGâ€™s API to present an unfiltered glimpse of human activity before it is skewered by an algorithm. The generative artwork invites the viewer to reflect on the extent to which humans are both intertwined with technology and manipulated by it. https://desbiens-desmeules.com/alter-ego/
